title: Feta, rocket and olive pasta salad
description: Our healthy pasta salad, bursting with herby goodness can be made in a matter of minutes.This meal, if served as eight portions, provides 260kcal, 11g protein, 34g carbohydrate (of which 2g sugars), 8g fat (of which 4g saturates), 3.5g fibre and 0.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 350g/12oz penne, rigatoni or other similar shaped pasta
8-10 large sprigs of mint, leaves removed, and chopped/torn if large
flaked sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
